H0.text: What is the official language of Barbados. Portuguese

H1.text: What is the official language of Barbados. French

H2.text: What is the official language of Barbados. Spanish

H3.text: What is the official language of Barbados. Englis

A4.text: English is the official language of Barbados

A5.text: The standard of English in Barbados conforms to vocabulary, pronunciations, spellings, and conventions akin to, but not exactly the same as, those of British English
